DOC.brief_summary: Comparison 3 group : - group I hallux rigidus . Is fasicitis plantaris present ? - group II fasicitis plantaris . Does hallux limit mobility ? - group III hallux rigidus fasicitis plantaris
DOC.brief_title: The Correlation Between Fasicitis Plantaris Hallux Rigidus
DOC.criteria: Hallux rigidus fasicitis plantaris healthy volunteer
